name: Satyagraha
summary_text: A corporate go-getter sees his priorities shift when a personal tragedy brings him face-to-face with political corruption.

name: Shadows in Paradise
summary_text: An episode in the life of Nikander, a garbage man, involving the death of a coworker, a love affair and much more.

name: House of Dracula
summary_text: The Wolf Man and Count Dracula beg Dr. Edelman to cure them of their killing instincts but Dracula schemes to seduce the doctor's nurse.

name: The Statement
summary_text: Tale of a former Nazi executioner who becomes a target of hitmen and police investigators.

name: Última Parada 174
summary_text: A chronicle of a real-life bus hijacking in Rio de Janeiro that occurred on June 12, 2000.

name: Ddongpari
summary_text: A bitter loan shark strikes a friendship with a troubled schoolgirl as he faces his own troubled past with his abusive father.

name: Legendary
summary_text: A book-smart teenager joins his school's wrestling team as a way to reunite his surviving family members, who split apart after the death of his father, a college wrestling legend, 10 years ago.

name: Jathi Ratnalu
summary_text: The plot revolves around the three prisoners. They get released and plan for a happy life outside. Things take a new turn and bring in a twist. Can they find happiness and love now?

name: Spadikam
summary_text: A small-town criminal constantly clashes with his strict school headmaster father at the expense of their family lives.

name: Intimate Stories
summary_text: Three people and a baby set off on separate journeys, along the same road; their disparate dreams and stories intertwine amidst the breathtaking deserted Patagonic route.

name: Merci pour le Chocolat
summary_text: In Lausanne, the aspirant pianist Jeanne Pollet has lunch with her mother Louise Pollet, her boyfriend Axel and his mother. Lenna leans that when she was born, a nurse had mistakenly told ...                See full summary »

name: Goldstone
summary_text: Indigenous detective Jay Swan arrives in the town of Goldstone to search for a missing person, and his simple duty becomes complicated when he uncovers a web of crime and corruption.

name: Ghayal Once Again
summary_text: When a video of his mentor's murder surfaces, an investigative journalist takes action to find those responsible.

name: Waffle Street
summary_text: After being fired as VP in a big mortgage fund (fall guy), Jim decides on a complete change and starts work at a 24/7 diner.

name: De ofrivilliga
summary_text: In several unrelated stories, the consequences of putting one's foot down - or failing to do so - are explored.

name: The Incredible Mr. Limpet
summary_text: Meek and mild mannered bookkeeper Henry Limpet has few passions in life. It's mid-1941 and he would love to join the Navy but has been rated 4F. His friend George Stickle is in the Navy and...                See full summary »

name: Yeom-lyeok
summary_text: After drinking water from a mountain spring, a bank security guard gains telekinetic superpowers, which he must use to save his estranged daughter from an evil construction company, as a superhero.

name: Slumber Party Massacre II
summary_text: Courtney Bates, the younger sister of Valerie, and her friends go to their condo for a weekend getaway, but Courtney can't get rid of the haunting feeling that a supernatural rockabilly driller killer is coming to murder them all.

name: Wings of Honneamise
summary_text: In an alternative Earth, a young astronaut participates in a controversial fledgling space program.

name: Devasuram
summary_text: The heir to a village elder's family squanders his inheritance and bullies all and sundry.

name: The Education of Charlie Banks
summary_text: College student Charlie Banks has to face old problems when the bully he had an unpleasant encounter with back in high school shows up on his campus.

name: Tom Horn
summary_text: An ex-army scout is hired by ranchers to kill cattle rustlers but he gets into trouble with the corrupt local officials when he kills a boy.

name: Remember the Night
summary_text: Love blooms between a sympathetic attorney and the comely shoplifter he has taken home for the Christmas holiday.

name: Terror Firmer
summary_text: A homicidal maniac is on the loose in the city and the low-budget film crew of a Troma movie has the power to stop them.

name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
summary_text: In 15th-century Paris, the brother of the archdeacon plots with the gypsy king to foment a peasant revolt. Meanwhile, a freakish hunchback falls in love with the gypsy queen.

name: Battle Creek Brawl
summary_text: A young Asian-American martial artist is forced to participate in a brutal formal street-fighting competition.

name: Tian bian yi duo yun
summary_text: Hsiao-Kang, now working as a pornographic actor, meets Shiang-chyi once again. Meanwhile, the city of Taipei faces a water shortage that makes the sales of watermelons skyrocket.

name: True Colors
summary_text: Best friends from law school to election night, their friendship is sorely tested when one learns of another's betrayal.

name: Beautiful City
summary_text: In Islamic Iran, how much is a woman worth in comparison with a man, and who pays the difference? This film is tale of vengeance, labyrinthine judicial procedure & the concept of "blood money."

name: The Hound of the Baskervilles
summary_text: When the latest heir to the Baskerville estate seems to be threatened by a family curse, only the master detective, Sherlock Holmes, can find out the truth.

name: Not Suitable for Children
summary_text: A young playboy who learns he has one month until he becomes infertile sets out to procreate as much as possible.

name: Kebab Connection
summary_text: In Hamburg, Ibrahim "Ibo" Secmez, of Turkish descent, wants to direct the first German kung-fu movie. For now, he makes commercials for his uncle's kebab restaurant. Titzie, an aspiring ...                See full summary »

name: Curdled
summary_text: After getting interested in murder as a kid in Colombia, Gabriela now has a scrapbook on murders including clippings on "The Blue Blood Killer". While cleaning his latest murder scene in Miami, she comes across a clue missed by the cops.

name: And Life Goes On
summary_text: A director and his son return to a region damaged by the Guilan earthquake, hoping to find the children who appeared in his film a few years earlier.

name: Hitman
summary_text: Two hitmen, one a novice and the other a veteran with poor luck, band together to find the "King of Killers" for whom there is a large reward.

name: Damnation Alley
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic world, a group of survivors travel and find other settlements in huge custom designed all terrain vehicles.

name: Otis
summary_text: Suburban America gone haywire. In the midst of a serial abductor/killer's rampage, a beautiful young teen, Riley Lawson, goes missing. When her desperate parents, Will and Kate, are ...                See full summary »

name: Dinner Rush
summary_text: At a popular NYC Italian restaurant on a dramatic, busy evening, there are 2 gangsters, cop detective, food-critic, ex bookmaker owner, his chef son, indebted gambler sous-chef etc.

name: Princesas
summary_text: Friendship and love in the world of prostitution in Madrid.

name: The Impostors
summary_text: Wrongly accused of physically abusing a fellow actor, starving thespians Arthur and Maurice find themselves pursued by the law aboard a cruise ship.

name: Sir
summary_text: A prosperous young Indian man falls in love with his servant, a widow with the dream of becoming a fashion designer.

name: Royal Wedding
summary_text: A brother and sister dance act encounter challenges and romance when booked in London during the Royal Wedding.

name: Maelstrom
summary_text: After plunging her car into a river, a woman encounters a man who helps her come to terms with her life.

name: Amateur Night
summary_text: An unemployed architect's pregnant wife finds him a job as driver on Craigslist. Showing up, he starts right away driving prostitutes to clients. Will he survive the day?

name: What Richard Did
summary_text: A promising young man about to start university suddenly throws his life into uncertainty when he accidentally commits a serious crime.

name: Riding Alone for Thousands of Miles
summary_text: A Japanese father travels to China's Yunnan province in the place of his ailing son to film a folk-opera singer.

name: Arrhythmia
summary_text: A paramedic devoted to his patients struggles to make time for his wife who begins to believe his patients are more important to him than she is.

name: Cool Cat Saves the Kids
summary_text: In Hollywood, California, Cool Cat, alongside his human father Daddy Derek, embarks on his most challenging journey yet: saving the kids from Butch the Bully. Can he do it?

name: Bloomington
summary_text: "Bloomington" is a coming-of-age drama about a former child actress attending college in search of independence and who ends up becoming romantically involved with a female professor.

name: Wai dor lei ah yat ho
summary_text: Cheng Li-sheung is a young, upwardly mobile professional finally ready to invest in her first home. But when the deal falls through, she is forced to keep her dream alive - even if it means keeping her would-be neighbors dead.

name: Brian Banks
summary_text: A football player's dreams to play in the NFL are halted when he is wrongly convicted and sent to prison. Years later, he fights to clear his name within an unjust system.

name: The Puffy Chair
summary_text: Josh Sagers drives cross-country on a mission to deliver his father's birthday gift - a giant purple LazyBoy.

name: Divided We Fall
summary_text: In Nazi occupied Czech Republic (then Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia), a childless couple agree to hide a Jewish friend at great personal risk of discovery and execution.

name: The Comfort of Strangers
summary_text: A couple retreat to Venice to work on their relationship, but an encounter with a stranger leads them into a world of intrigue - where their darkest desires are in reach.

name: Scusa ma ti chiamo amore
summary_text: Mayhem ensues when a 37-year-old ad executive on the rebound falls for a bubbly high school senior.

name: Bite the Bullet
summary_text: A pair of ex-Rough Riders, a former prostitute, a gunfighter, an aging cowboy and an English gentleman enter a 700-mile horse race through the Southwest desert in 1908.

name: Frankenfish
summary_text: A genetically-altered fish wreaks havoc on a small fishing town.

name: Billion Dollar Brain
summary_text: A former British spy stumbles onto a plot to overthrow Communism with the help of a supercomputer. But who is working for whom?

name: Confirmation
summary_text: Judge Clarence Thomas' nomination to the United States Supreme Court is called into question when Anita Hill, a former colleague, testifies that he sexually harassed her.

name: Watch Out for the Automobile
summary_text: A very good cop tries to catch a very insidious and extremely clever serial car thief. The bitter irony is that the thief is not very clever, absolutely not insidious, and moreover - a virtuous person and his friend.

name: Männerherzen
summary_text: The story follows six very different men and their struggles with women, family and work. Yet, they are somehow connected to each other.

name: The Bedroom Window
summary_text: A young executive starts an affair with his boss's wife which then escalates into a nightmare after he lies to the police in order to protect her.

name: Ali and Nino
summary_text: Love story of a Muslim Azerbaijani boy and Christian Georgian girl in Baku from 1918 to 1920.

name: As the Gods Will
summary_text: A group of high school students are forced to play a game of death without knowing who, why or how.

name: Screwed in Tallinn
summary_text: Percy Nilegaard collects Swedish single men and embarks on a bus trip to Tallinn with a so-called "highly-experienced driver".

name: The Drowning Pool
summary_text: Harper's a big-city PI, who travels to Louisiana to help an old girlfriend who's worried her husband will find out she's been cheating on him.

name: Pal Joey
summary_text: Joey Evans' a charming, handsome, funny, talented a-1st class, A-N°.1 - heel. When Joey meets the former chorus girl and now is the rich widow, Vera Simpson, the pair of lecherous souls seem made for each other.

name: Parched
summary_text: In the arid landscape of Rajasthan, four women navigate their way through personal and cultural difficulties.

name: The Dresser
summary_text: Personal assistant Norman struggles to get deteriorating veteran actor Sir through a difficult performance of King Lear.

name: Downrange
summary_text: Stranded at the side of the road after a tire blowout, a group of friends become targets for an enigmatic sniper.

name: Life on the Line
summary_text: A crew of men who do the high-wire work of fixing the electrical grid are hit by a sudden deadly storm.

name: Man's Favorite Sport?
summary_text: The author of a best-selling fishing guide is actually incredibly inexperienced when it comes to the sport, which causes mayhem when he is entered into a competition.

name: Cover Girl
summary_text: Rusty Parker wins a contest and becomes a celebrated cover girl; this endangers her romance with dancing mentor Danny.

name: Panfilov's 28
summary_text: In November 1941, remaining squad of Soviet soldiers must stop a column of Nazi Germany tanks.

name: The Block Island Sound
summary_text: Something lurks off the coast of Block Island, silently influencing the behavior of fisherman, Tom Lynch. After suffering a series of violent outbursts, he unknowingly puts his family in grave danger.

name: Pon
summary_text: Investigative reporter Ji-won begins to receive a series of menacing calls. To escape the terrifying and relentless clanging of the telephone, she changes her number and moves out. But the threatening campaign of terror continues unabated.

name: Coffee Town
summary_text: A website manager enlists the help of his two friends in order to convince the owners of his favorite coffee shop -- which doubles as his office -- not to turn their business into a bar.

name: Play
summary_text: An astute observation based on real cases of bullying. In central Gothenburg, Sweden, a group of boys, aged 12-14, robbed other children on about 40 occasions between 2006 and 2008. The ...                See full summary »

name: Holy Rollers
summary_text: In Brooklyn, a youth from an Orthodox Jewish community is lured into becoming an Ecstasy dealer by his pal who has ties to an Israeli drug cartel.

name: Best Seller
summary_text: A hitman approachs a writer to help him create the next best seller on his career, but the violent world he was a part of has other plans.

name: What Will People Say
summary_text: The story of Nisha, daughter of a Pakistani-Norwegian family, who is kidnapped to Pakistan by her parents when her father finds her in bed with a man.

name: Bad Johnson
summary_text: A charismatic womanizer receives his comeuppance after his penis mysteriously leaves his body and takes human form.

name: Ujda Chaman
summary_text: Chaman Kohli is 30 -year-old bachelor with Premature Balding and in quest of a beautiful wife. Chaman hits rock bottom when an astrologer gives him a deadline to find himself a wife or remain a celibate forever.

name: Beyond Rangoon
summary_text: Laura is trying to pick up the pieces of her life after the murder of her husband and son, and goes on vacation with her sister to Burma. After losing her passport at a political rally, she...                See full summary »

name: Moon to
summary_text: A special agent has for 8 years been deep undercover in Asia's lucrative organized crime trade as he plays protégé to one of the key players, Banker. Now, Nick has but he has started to feel loyalty to his new environment and to the money.

name: Cado dalle nubi
summary_text: A southern italian singer moves to Milan to have more chances with his career, bringing with him a little bit of South.

name: Treasure Island
summary_text: The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate Captain Long John Silver.

name: My Mother's Castle
summary_text: Every holiday Marcel and his family go to their cottage near Marseilles. During one of these holidays he meets Isabelle, a pretty but conceited girl... Adapted from the cult classic novel from Marcel Pagnol.

name: Modern Problems
summary_text: Jealous, harried air traffic controller Max Fiedler, recently dumped by his girlfriend, comes into contact with nuclear waste and is granted the power of telekinesis, which he uses not only to win her back, but to gain a little revenge.

name: The Lovers
summary_text: Saddled with a dull husband and a foolish lover, a woman has an affair with a stranger.

name: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
summary_text: Batman and Robin of the 1960s live action series are back in action to take down their fiendish foes united once more against them.

summary_text: A rag-tag bunch of seniors, complete outsiders at their surf-crazed Laguna Beach High School, decide to crash the biggest team surf contest. In order to prevail, however, they must do one ...                See full summary »

name: The Star Maker
summary_text: A photographer and the types of people he encounters.

summary_text: This movie chronicles the life of Lane Frost, 1987 PRCA Bull Riding World Champion, his marriage and his friendships with Tuff Hedeman (three-time World Champion) and Cody Lambert.

summary_text: In 1870s New Mexico, a half-breed kills a bigoted sheriff in self-defense but the posse that eventually hunts him finds itself in dangerous territory.

name: Domino
summary_text: A Copenhagen police officer seeks justice for his partner's murder by a mysterious man.

summary_text: The final film in a highly romanticized trilogy about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria finds the young empress traveling throughout Europe.

summary_text: A computer-scientist/novelist reunites with his childhood friend, hacks into government databases, and faces the dire and fateful consequences of the mystical actions he obtained as a child.

name: Indoo Ki Jawani
summary_text: A coming-of-age story of a girl who experience life through misadventures & dating apps.

name: Miami Connection
summary_text: A martial arts rock band goes up against a band of motorcycle ninjas who have tightened their grip on Florida's narcotics trade.

name: Angoor

summary_text: A wealthy woman from Manhattan's Upper East Side struggles to deal with her new identity and her sexuality after her husband of sixteen years leaves her for a younger woman.

summary_text: A man's newly transplanted heart leads him on a dangerous journey to find out who murdered its donor.

summary_text: A mockumentary following an ambitious TV network executive trying to produce a controversial reality show where contestants play Russian Roulette.

summary_text: Talk show special guests air their grievances backstage and in front of the cameras as the host struggles to manage the mayhem that ensues.

name: Mibu gishi den

summary_text: A chronicle of Terri Hooley's life, a record-store owner instrumental in developing Belfast's punk-rock scene.

summary_text: Two low-life punks invite themselves to a party at a posh villa and after being taunted by their snobbish hosts, hold everyone hostage and subject them to various forms of torture and mayhem.

name: Clergy
summary_text: Three Catholic priests meet to celebrate the anniversary of an event which could have taken their lives. Their experiences and motivations to serve as priests are extremely different, and soon each of them will have to face new challenges.

name: The Boy

summary_text: While working alongside his long-time friend and colleague in building a hospital for the residents of a Buenos Aries shantytown, a troubled priest finds solace in a young, atheist social worker.

summary_text: A corrupt policeman commits a crime when drinking late at night. While his colleagues are trying to investigate his murder, he tries to clean up the evidence.

name: Durgamati: The Myth
summary_text: A bureaucrat is imprisoned in a haunted house for interrogation. However, things take an unexpected turn when she gets possessed by a spirit.

summary_text: An ex lawyer now fisherman sees his fishing boat sunk by a lightning. His insurance company claims "Act of God". Sue the insurance company or God/churches?

name: Looker
summary_text: Three of four models, who had plastic surgery done by Larry after a computed list, are dead. Neither the cops nor Larry believe they're suicides. Larry investigates and stays with the fourth model. Who's behind the lists and murders?

summary_text: The son of an eccentric detective steps into his father's shoes after his mother is wrongly arrested for stealing a baby panda.

summary_text: A regular suburban family man comes home from work on his birthday to find a deserted house and a videotape waiting to be played...

name: Tai ji 1: Cong ling kai shi
summary_text: Yang travels to Chen Village to learn a powerful form of Tai Chi. Though villagers are forbidden from teaching outsiders, Yang becomes their best hope for survival when a man arrives with a plan to build a railroad through the village.

summary_text: A crook quietly plots his revenge against the boss who murdered his brother while working for him.

name: The Defender
summary_text: A corrupt businessman commits a murder and the only witness is the girlfriend of another businessman with close connections to the Chinese government, so a bodyguard from Beijing is ...                See full summary »

name: The Guyver
summary_text: A young man discovers a mechanical device that merges with his own body, turning him into a cyborg superhero. When strange creatures start appearing, trying to take the device back, he ...                See full summary »

name: Wild River
summary_text: A TVA bureaucrat comes to the river to do what none of his predecessors have been able to do - evict a stubborn octogenarian from her island before the rising waters engulf her.

name: Anadolu Kartallari
summary_text: The film, commissioned for the centenary of the Turkish Air Force, was filmed in collaboration with the Turkish Air Force in the air base in Konya. Some aerial scenes were notably performed.

name: The Criminal Life of Archibaldo de la Cruz
summary_text: The delirious journey of a mental disordered man, who is obsessed in making the perfect crime.

name: Le boulet
summary_text: It is the story of two types: Moltes a criminal in prison and Reggio one of the guards. Crazy adventures happen when following a winner ticket to Africa, they competes in a rally and are chased by the Turk, a sworn enemy of Moltes.

name: The Seven-Ups
summary_text: A tough detective who is part of an elite New York City unit is trying to find out who killed his partner, but uncovers a plot to kidnap mobsters for money.

name: Germinal
summary_text: In mid-nineteenth-century northern France, a coal mining town's workers are exploited by the mine's owner. One day, they decide to go on strike, and the authorities repress them.

name: Happily Ever After
summary_text: Is the love compatible with coupledom? And what of freedom and fidelity? These are some of the questions facing two married men.

name: Police, Adjective
summary_text: A police officer refuses to arrest a young man for offering drugs to his friends.

name: Wild Hearts Can't Be Broken
summary_text: Thrilled by a performance she sees at a fair, Sonora tries to land a spot as a daredevil who rides horses off of high dives.

name: Ginger and Fred
summary_text: Amelia and Pippo are reunited after several decades to perform their old music-hall act on a TV variety show.

name: Asylum
summary_text: A woman becomes very curious about one of her psychiatrist husband's inmates, a man who was found guilty in the murder and disfigurement of his former wife.

name: My Father is a Hero
summary_text: An undercover cop struggling to provide for his son and ailing wife, must infiltrate a ruthless gang. But things turn sour when another cop blows his cover and he quickly finds himself battling for his life and the lives of his family.

name: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
summary_text: A novelist aided by his future father-in-law conspires to frame himself for the murder of a burlesque dancer as part of an effort to ban capital punishment.

name: Mighty Joe Young
summary_text: A young woman who has raised a giant gorilla from an infant brings him to Hollywood years later seeking her fortune.

name: The Scarlet Claw
summary_text: When a gentlewoman is found dead with her throat torn out, the villagers blame a supernatural monster. But Sherlock Holmes, who gets drawn into the case from nearby Quebec, suspects a human murderer.

name: Hangmen Also Die!
summary_text: After the Nazi administrator of Czechoslovakia is shot, his assassin tries to elude the Gestapo and struggles with his impulse to give himself up as hostages are executed.

name: Man Hunt
summary_text: British hunter Thorndike vacationing in Bavaria has Hitler in his gun sight. He is captured, beaten, left for dead, and escapes back to London where he is hounded by German agents and aided by a young woman.

name: Mental
summary_text: A charismatic, crazy hothead transforms a family's life when she becomes the nanny of five girls whose mother has cracked from her husband's political ambitions and his infidelity.

name: Danny Deckchair
summary_text: An Aussie becomes a national sensation when he lifts off in his deck chair tied to balloons.

name: Thondi Muthalum Driksakshiyum
summary_text: Prasad and Sreeja enter wedlock and move to a new place to continue the rest of their lives. Unfortunate events begin to take place after Prasad, a small-time thief, robs Sreeja's gold chain during a bus journey.

name: She Dies Tomorrow
summary_text: Amy thinks she's dying tomorrow...and it's contagious.

name: Intimate Strangers
summary_text: A Frenchwoman tells her marital troubles to a man she mistakes for a psychiatrist, and soon they form an unusual relationship.

name: Girl Walks Into a Bar
summary_text: A sharp-witted comedy that follows a group of apparent strangers in interlocking stories taking place in ten different bars during the course of one evening throughout Los Angeles.

name: Guilty as Sin
summary_text: A female lawyer takes an accused wife-murderer as a client, but finds herself morally compelled to betray him one way or another.

name: Midnight Lace
summary_text: In London, a recently wed American woman's sanity comes into question after she claims to be the victim of a threatening stalker.

name: Little Birds
summary_text: Lily and Alison face a life-changing event after they leave their Salton Sea home and follow the boys they meet back to Los Angeles.

name: The Hunted
summary_text: An American businessman visiting Nagoya, Japan, meets a woman in a hotel bar. Returning to her room, 3 ninjas kill her and wound him, but he sees the ninja boss' face. Now, he's the prime target of a dangerous ninja cult.

name: Room Service
summary_text: A penniless theatrical producer must outwit the hotel efficiency expert trying to evict him from his room, while securing a backer for his new play.

name: Hachi-ko
summary_text: The true story about a dog's loyalty to its master, even after his death.

name: Gwai wik
summary_text: A writer wants to get a glimpse of some genuine supernatural occurrences while doing research for a novel, but her experiences lead her down a dark path as she witnesses vivid hallucinations and begins to lose her grip on reality.

name: Loro 1
summary_text: A film about the life of Silvio Berlusconi.

name: Scenes from a Marriage
summary_text: Scenes from a Marriage chronicles the many years of love and turmoil that bind Marianne (Liv Ullmann) and Johan (Erland Josephson) through matrimony, infidelity, divorce, and subsequent partners.

name: Herod's Law
summary_text: Mexico, 1949. The fable of a janitor turned Mayor on a little town lost in the Mexican desert, who gradually realizes how far his new acquainted power and corruption can get him.

name: House Party 3
summary_text: Kid, after a lifetime 'playing the field', is about to get married. 'Play' plans to throw the best bachelor party ever - until 'Kid's' three wise-crackin' nephews come to town, intent on showing them what parties are all about.

name: The House with Laughing Windows
summary_text: Stefano, a young restorer, is commissioned to save a controversial mural located in the church of a small, isolated village.

name: Jetsons: The Movie
summary_text: George Jetson is forced to uproot his family when Mr. Spacely promotes him to take charge of a new factory on a distant planet.

name: God of Gamblers
summary_text: A master gambler loses his memory, and is befriended by a street hustler who discovers his supernatural gambling abilities.

name: The Ardennes
summary_text: A brutal home-jacking by two brothers goes hopelessly wrong, and one of them goes to prison. Four years later, his brother tries to help him get his life back on track.

name: Digging Up the Marrow
summary_text: A documentary exploring genre based monster art takes an odd turn when the filmmakers are contacted by a man who claims he can prove that monsters are indeed real.

name: One 2 Ka 4
summary_text: When a cop's partner is killed in the line of duty, he assumed guardianship of his orphaned children while investigating the murder.

name: Life with Father
summary_text: A straitlaced turn-of-the-century father presides over a family of boys and the mother who really rules the roost.

name: El Norte
summary_text: After their family is killed in a government massacre, brother and sister Enrique and Rosa flee Guatemala and embark on a perilous journey to "El Norte": the United States.

name: The Revenge of Frankenstein

name: Human Capital
summary_text: The lives of two different families collide when their children begin a relationship that leads to a tragic accident.

name: Beomjoidosi
summary_text: Based on real events, this crime action film depicts a Seoul detective's attempts to keep peace while two Chinese-Korean gangs battle over turf in the neighborhood.

name: Bure baruta
summary_text: Random Belgrade citizens interact with each other in a night full of crime, frustration, betrayal and revenge.

name: Hanover Street
summary_text: Margaret is a nurse in England during WW2, and married to a secret agent. Things get complicated when she falls for David, an American pilot.

name: Hunger
summary_text: Five strangers struggle when a madman imprisons them in an underground dungeon in this nail-biting horror.

name: Ek Chalis Ki Last Local
summary_text: A comic thriller about two people who miss the last local train at 1:40 am and how missing of their train changes their course of life forever.

name: Miss Minoes
summary_text: A cat who turns into a young woman helps a journalist protect their town from a factory boss with an evil plan.

name: Music from Another Room
summary_text: A man's search for his one true love, whose birth he assisted in as a five-year-old. Starring Jude Law & Gretchen Mol.

name: Mr. Wrong
summary_text: A lonely single woman finds the seemingly-perfect man to date, but soon regrets it when his deranged, possessive other personality emerges and she cannot convince anyone else of his Jekyll-and-Hyde true nature.

name: Speechless
summary_text: Two political speechwriters fall in love before they find out they are working for candidates on opposite sides.

name: Moon 44
summary_text: An unconventional corporate agent is given the task of shaping a group of violent criminals and technical wizards into a helicopter defense force assigned to protect a mining station on a remote moon.

name: Känn ingen sorg
summary_text: Pål dreams about success within the musical world, but he has an obstacle; himself. His deep thoughts keeps him end up in trouble. We follow Pål on a emotional inner travel to find his call on the swedish west coast of Gothenburg.

name: Born to Kill
summary_text: A calculating divorcée risks her chances at wealth and security with a man she doesn't love by getting involved with the hotheaded murderer romancing her foster sister.

name: Fukrey Returns
summary_text: Just out of jail, a don is ready to get back at the four friends who conned her.

name: Geograf globus propil
summary_text: The ordinary troubles of the ordinary teacher in the ordinary class during the ordinary midlife crisis.

name: Devil's Playground
summary_text: As the world succumbs to a zombie apocalypse, Cole, a hardened mercenary, is chasing the one person who can provide a cure. In his way aren't only the flesh-eating, super-athletic cannibals...                See full summary »

name: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls
summary_text: Via a magic mirror, Twilight Sparkle travels into an alternate universe in order to recover a crown that was stolen from the Crystal Empire. Upon her arrival she is horrified to learn that she has turned into a human.

name: Atrocious
summary_text: Two teenage siblings endure a terrifying experience while investigating a rural legend near their family's vacation home.

name: Perdiendo el norte
summary_text: Two young Spanish men, with a university education, are tired of unemployment and decide to move to Germany. But soon they will find out that finding a better living is not as easy as they expected.

name: Maskeli Besler: Kibris
summary_text: A Turkish comedy film directed by Murat Aslan about an incompetent gang of criminals attempting to go straight, which was the fifth highest-grossing Turkish film of 2008.

name: Marooned
summary_text: Three American astronauts are stranded in space when their retros won't fire. Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?

name: Kickboxer: Retaliation
summary_text: Right after winning a fight in Las Vegas, Kurt Sloane is sedated and taken to a prison in Bangkok, where he's forced to fight a 6'10" giant for freedom and $1M - but this will require some intense training.

name: The Isle
summary_text: When their boat sinks, 3 men make it to an Isle they'll wish they had never found.

name: The Clown
summary_text: Father and son work as clowns Puro Sangue/Valdemar and Pangare/Benjamin in a circus in the Brazilian countryside. Benjamin decides to follow a different path and meets several people on the way.

name: Krugovi
summary_text: The impact of a selfless deed of benevolence and heroism right in the middle of the raging Bosnian war inextricably intertwines the lives of five people who are still affected by its consequences, over a decade later.

name: Ekipazh
summary_text: Aircraft crew members must put off their differences when a natural disaster threatens to death hundreds of tourists.

name: Sand Sharks
summary_text: The residents of a small town team up to kill a group of evolved sharks that can swim in sand, and are terrorizing local beaches.

name: Into the Storm
summary_text: Continuing the storyline of The Gathering Storm (2002), Churchill at War is a look at the former British prime minister's life and career at the end of WWII.

name: Kochadaiiyaan
summary_text: A noble warrior seeks revenge against the ruler of his kingdom, who killed his father. At the same time, he also ends up upsetting the neighboring enemy kingdom's ruler.

name: On the Other Side of the Tracks
summary_text: Two mismatched cops team up to investigate the murder of a business mogul's wife.

name: The Patience Stone
summary_text: In a war ridden country a woman watches over the husband reduced to a vegetable state by a bullet in the neck, abandoned by Jihad companions and brothers. One day, the woman decides to say things to him she could never have done before.

name: Come Undone
summary_text: Mathieu, 18, spends the summer at his mother's summer house, in Brittany. On the beach, he meets Cédric, a boy his age. A love-story begins between the two boys.

name: Alone in the Dark
summary_text: A quartet of murderous psychopaths break out of a mental hospital during a power blackout and lay siege to their doctor's house.

name: The Toy
summary_text: A poor journalist finds himself as a toy of a boss' son. Making friends with a naughty child, he tries to save him from the cruel power of his father.

name: Orphans of the Storm
summary_text: Two orphaned sisters are caught up in the turmoil of the French Revolution, encountering misery and love along the way.

name: Tarzan and His Mate
summary_text: The idyllic life of Tarzan and Jane is challenged by men on safari who come seeking ivory, and come seeking Jane as well.

name: The F**k-It List
summary_text: After a prank blows up on a high school senior's life, he shares a list of certain things he wishes he'd done differently.

name: The First King
summary_text: Romulus and Remus, two shepherds and loyal brothers, end up taking part to a journey that will lead one of them to be the founder of the greatest nation ever seen. However, the fate of the chosen one will pass from killing his own brother.

name: Greater
summary_text: The story of Brandon Burlsworth, possibly the greatest walk-on in the history of college football.

name: Kaavalan
summary_text: Meera starts calling bhoomi, her bodyguard just to fool him by telling him she loves him. Problems arise when bhoomi falls in love with her not knowing who she is.

name: Carry on Camping
summary_text: Farcical misadventures by guests in an English holiday centre.

name: The Horseman
summary_text: When Christian finds out his runaway teenage daughter, Jesse has been sexually attacked, the suburban father loses it. Setting out to find Jesse's attacker, Christian goes on a violent rampage.

name: My Lucky Stars
summary_text: Muscles, cop from Hong Kong, is in Japan chasing a bad HK cop. His cop partner gets taken by the ninja gang. Muscles gets his 5 old no-good friends from the orphanage to help find the bad cop. Lots of comedy and kung-fu fighting follows.

name: The Raven
summary_text: Dr. Vollin is a brilliant but unstable surgeon with a morbid obsession for instruments of torture. He saves the life of Jean Thatcher, a beautiful young socialite injured in an automobile accident and becomes increasingly attracted to her.

name: Abhrahaminte Santhathikal
summary_text: Derick Abraham, a fiery and dutiful police officer, continues to be the best officer until his brother Philip Abraham gets arrested for false murder charges. Will he be able to investigate the case and serve justice to his brother?

name: La mujer sin cabeza
summary_text: After hitting something with her car, a bourgeois Argentine woman's life slowly descends into paranoia and isolation, as she fears she may have killed someone.

name: The Flying Deuces
summary_text: Ollie has fallen in love with the innkeeper's daughter in Paris. The only problem - she's very much in love with her husband. To forget her he joins the Foreign Legion with Stan. Bad idea.

name: Tramps
summary_text: A young man and woman find love in an unlikely place while carrying out a shady deal.

name: Torrente 4
summary_text: The rude, lewd and crude Spanish ex-police officer Torrente finds himself facing jail time. Can he survive a twisted irony that places him where he has put so many others, both guilty and innocent?

name: Kurbaan
summary_text: A woman finds that her neighbors are terrorists, and her husband is not who he claims to be.

name: How She Move
summary_text: Following her sister's death from drug addiction, a high school student is forced to leave her private school to return to her old, crime-filled neighborhood where she re-kindles an unlikely passion for the competitive world of step dancing.

name: 976-EVIL
summary_text: People who dial 976-EVIL receive supernatural powers and turn into satanic killers.

name: Hell of the Living Dead
summary_text: After an experiment gone wrong, a virus that turns people into zombies spreads throughout New Guinea, whilst a female reporter and her cameraman and a team of four commandos sent to investigate try to survive the onslaught.

name: Kosmos
summary_text: A strange man with otherworldly talents becomes both a friend and a pariah in a small Turkish town in this drama from writer and director Reha Erdem. Yahya is nearly in a panic when his ...                See full summary »

name: North Dallas Forty
summary_text: A satire of American professional football in which a veteran pass-catcher's individuality and refusal to become part of the team family is bitterly resented by his disciplinarian coaches.

name: Beyond the Poseidon Adventure
summary_text: An extension of the previous film, wherein a cache of adventurers return to the overturned ship to seek several fortunes.

name: The Big Store
summary_text: A detective is hired to protect the life of a singer, who has recently inherited a department store, from the store's crooked manager.

name: Dolly Kitty and Those Twinkling Stars
summary_text: A disillusioned Delhi wife and her new-in-town cousin navigate damning secrets, dreams and their thorny dynamic on their respective roads to freedom.

name: Pioneer
summary_text: A thriller set at the beginning of the 1980's Norwegian Oil Boom and centered on a diver whose obsession with reaching the bottom of the Norwegian Sea leads to tragedy.

name: The Daytrippers
summary_text: When she discovers a love letter written to her husband by an unknown paramour, the distraught Eliza turns to her tight-knit Long Island family for advice.

name: Vitus
summary_text: A twelve-year-old piano prodigy who suffocates from his parent's big dreams for him decides to make his escape--and with the aid of his grandfather--chase his own dreams instead.

name: Bébé's Kids
summary_text: To impress his new girlfriend, a man agrees to look after her friend's kids, only to find that they are uncontrollably rambunctious.

name: Mississippi Masala
summary_text: An ethnic Indian family is expelled from Idi Amin's Uganda in 1972 and lives in Mississippi 17 years later. The dad sues Uganda to get his property back. The grown daughter falls in love with a black man.

name: Pilgrimage
summary_text: In 13th-century Ireland, a group of monks must escort a sacred relic across a landscape fraught with peril.

name: Golden Door
summary_text: A Sicilian peasant begins the journey to the promised land and meets a beautiful Englishwoman. But neither is prepared for the harsh realities of Ellis Island. Can they make it through the golden door to the America of their dreams?

name: Sieranevada
summary_text: Centers around a family gathering on the anniversary of a patriarch's recent death.

name: The Comedy
summary_text: Indifferent to the notion of inheriting his father's estate, a restless, aging New Yorker passes time with his friends in games of mock sincerity and irreverence.

name: 3, 2, 1... Frankie Go Boom
summary_text: Frank Bartlett has been tortured, embarrassed, and humiliated by his brother Bruce -- usually on film -- his entire life. Now that Bruce is finally off drugs and has turned his life around, things should be different. They are not.

name: The Twins Effect
summary_text: It's a high-kicking battle on the dark side when an ace vampire slayer and his beautiful sidekicks wage the ultimate martial-arts showdown with one of the most dangerous of the undead.

name: Killers
summary_text: A psychopathic Japanese executive accidentally triggers a journalist's 'dark side'. They begin to connect over the Internet and make a complicated bond.

name: The Tale of Zatoichi
summary_text: The adventures of a blind, gambling masseur who also happens to be a master swordsman.

name: The Extra Man
summary_text: A man who escorts wealthy widows in New York's Upper East Side takes a young aspiring playwright under his wing.

name: Road to Paloma
summary_text: Wolf, a Native American on the run after avenging his mother's murder, flees across the desolate American West on his motorcycle, where he'll discover that justice has a cost.

name: McQ
summary_text: Seattle cop is caught up in a corrupt police force that he is trying to make right. McQ is a cop with a mission.

name: Heli
summary_text: Heli must try and protect his young family when his 12-year-old sister inadvertently involves them in the brutal drug world. He must battle against the drug cartel that have been angered as well as the corrupt police force.

name: The Daughter
summary_text: The story follows a man who returns home to discover a long-buried family secret, and whose attempts to put things right threaten the lives of those he left home years before.

name: To Each His Own Cinema
summary_text: A collective film of 33 shorts directed by different directors about their feeling about Cinema.

name: Mim mesle madar
summary_text: What appears to be a grand love story turns sour when parents-to-be discover that their unborn child will likely be born with serious birth defects, as a result of the mother's exposure to ...                See full summary »

name: O Cheiro do Ralo
summary_text: A pawn shop proprietor buys used goods from desperate locals--as much to play perverse power games as for his own livelihood, but when the perfect rump and a backed-up toilet enter his life, he loses all control.

name: Biwi No. 1
summary_text: A housewife learns that her husband is cheating on her. Thus, her quest to bring him back begins
